title: @Riot @KateyKhaos I drew Longhorn Alistar, can I please have 7 rp.

replies.body:
Take this to [support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) o:
Boards have no power with account issues ;c
They're right! I have no power, but support totally does! :D I think they'd be willing to grant you the RP. :)
